title: What is your favorite piece on the clarinet? - Quora

response.answer_text: My personal top three are (in no particular order of preference: 1) Brahms clarinet quintet in B minor op.115:  2) Copland clarinet concerto:  3) Mozart clarinet concerto in A:

My own Rhythm Suite for Clarinet and Marimba (which won the 2000 composition contest of the International Clarinet Association). Or perhaps my Aviary Divertimento (7 movements. Here’s the first one, Hummingbird Toccata on youtube:
